game.title: Find the Missing Pieces
game.objective: Collect all 10 pieces of the stolen artifact.
game.description: The artifact was stolen from the museum during the night. The thief dropped some pieces on their way out. Help us recover them before anyone else does!

task.description: The park is located south of the museum. Look for a small clearing near the pond.
The docks are located east of the museum. Look near the old warehouse.

task.objective: Search the abandoned mine for piece 10.
task.description: The mine is located northwest of the city. Be careful, it's dangerous!
task.location: Northwest of the City, Abandoned Mine
